body:
@damvantai Yeah, this helped! Thanks. I don't know why it wasn't installed along with package`cuda` or `nvidia-384`.

```
sudo apt install libcuda1-384
```

Just for completeness the file should be located at `/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1`.
